author: Roseline P
title: Excellent stay at Hilton -
text: Hilton stay was total value for money. Very spacious and clean. Huge and comfortable bed with soft pillows. Rain shower was awesome. Staff members were very attentive and helpful. Location was central and amongst some of the best shopping malls.I would highly recommend family and friends.
